title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.10 - Approval of vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.10 - Approval of vouchers

State Regulations
(a) All
payments of State assistance shall be made after audit and upon warrant of the

Comptroller on vouchers approved by the commissioner. (b) Moneys received pursuant to section
1263-a of article 12 of the Public Health Law, shall be expended only for
purposes consistent with the provisions of such section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
651.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
